India International Hospitality Expo 2024

Greater Noida

India International Hospitality Expo is all set to welcome B2B buyers from across luxury hotels, resorts, homestays, restaurants, cloud kitchens, and everyone in the hospitality and F&B space. The show has emerged as the most sought-after sourcing hub for the Hospitality and F&B industry. From CEOs to purchase heads and project management companies
